Section

Section is useful to display banner information, there are fluid by default (full width 100%) and must be used outside of .container

.section-overlay-black

My section title

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Adipisci aspernatur delectus dolores eius est, inventore minus mollitia nam nemo numquam odio odit officiis repellat sed sequi. Amet laudantium minus omnis!

content here

.section-overlay-white

My section title

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Adipisci aspernatur delectus dolores eius est, inventore minus mollitia nam nemo numquam odio odit officiis repellat sed sequi. Amet laudantium minus omnis!

Parallax (.bg-fixed)

My section title

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Adipisci aspernatur delectus dolores eius est, inventore minus mollitia nam nemo numquam odio odit officiis repellat sed sequi. Amet laudantium minus omnis!

Useful classes
.section-overlay-black
add overlay black
.section-overlay-white
add overlay white
.bg-fixed
for parallax effect
.bg-centered
to center background (default)
.bg-top-centered
to align background top center
.bg-bottom-centered
to align background bottom center
